report.query: SELECT sub_profile.lsp_short_name AS party_name, cc_segment.entry_name AS segmentName, rm.rm_mgr_name AS rmname, lmtProfile.LLP_BCA_REF_NUM AS camDocNo, to_char(lmtProfile.LLP_NEXT_ANNL_RVW_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') AS camExpDate, to_char(lmtProfile.LLP_EXTD_NEXT_RVW_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') AS camExtnDate, to_char(lmtProfile.RAM_RATING_FINALIZATION_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') as RAM_RATING_FINALIZATION_DATE, (select region_name from cms_region where ID = addr.lra_region) as region, lmtprofile.cam_type FROM SCI_LE_SUB_PROFILE sub_profile , cms_relationship_mgr rm , (SELECT entry_name,entry_code FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE category_code = 'HDFC_SEGMENT') cc_segment , sci_lsp_lmt_profile lmtProfile, SCI_LE_REG_ADDR addr

whereClause.mandatoryClause: cc_segment.entry_code (+)=sub_profile.lsp_sgmnt_code_value AND rm.id = sub_profile.relation_mgr AND sub_profile.cms_le_sub_profile_id = lmtProfile.cms_customer_id AND TRUNC(lmtProfile.LLP_EXTD_NEXT_RVW_DATE) < TRUNC(sysdate) AND sub_profile.CMS_LE_MAIN_PROFILE_ID = addr.CMS_LE_MAIN_PROFILE_ID AND addr.LRA_TYPE_VALUE = 'CORPORATE' AND sub_profile.status != 'INACTIVE'
